Articles.Content:
Can anyone recomend a good stable atmospheric plane designed for speed and stability?

I've tried up Engineeng the Ravenspear Mk 4 with turbojets and have managed to get up to 1.5 km/s but I want to go faster

Edited June 6, 2013 by DarthVader

Can anyone recomend a good stable atmospheric plane designed for speed and stability?

I've tried up Engineeng the Ravenspear Mk 4 with turbojets and have managed to get up to 1.5 km/s but I want to go faster

If you're looking for really fast planes, look here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27296-The-MachingBird-Challenge. It's not possible to go much faster than any of these planes because jets stop providing any thrust above a certain threshold velocity.
